definition: to expand/to push sth with the hand/to develop/to open up
to make a rubbing (e.g. of an inscription)

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Cut out the leaf rubbings with scissors.
sentences.chinese: 用剪刀將葉子拓片剪下。

sentences.english: Go around the edge of each leaf rubbing with a crayon of a contrasting color.
sentences.chinese: 用對比色勾出每張葉子拓片的邊緣。

sentences.english: The rubbings also make an attractive decoration for the front of a holiday greeting card.
sentences.chinese: 拓片也是節日賀卡正面引人注目的裝飾品。

sentences.english: Making leaf rubbings is a nice way to celebrate autumn with the kids.
sentences.chinese: 製作葉子拓片是和孩子們一起慶祝秋天的好辦法。

sentences.english: The rubbings are mounted in the Chinese way and have never been shown in China.
sentences.chinese: 拓片裱好以後，從此再沒有在中國展出。

sentences.english: Transfer the rubbings to the front of the construction paper card.
sentences.chinese: 再將拓片轉貼到圖畫用紙卡片的正面。

sentences.english: The rubbing of the garbled Chinese characters of The Archaeology of Memory sets a good example.
sentences.chinese: 恰如《記憶考古》這件作品的中文亂碼拓片。

sentences.english: Rubbing is a sort of special document.
sentences.chinese: 拓片是一種特殊的文獻形式。

sentences.english: Click on any source to show the inscriptions.
sentences.chinese: 點選其中一項即可顯示該拓片的搜尋結果。

definition: a rubbing from a stone inscription
stele/vertical stone tablet for carved inscriptions
tortoise shell and animal bones used in divination/oracle bone inscriptions (an early form of Chinese script)
authentic (painting or calligraphy)/genuine work (of famous artist)
early form of Chinese characters inscribed in stone, a precursor of the small seal 小篆[xiao3 zhuan4]
Xiping steles, calligraphic work on carved steles of the Eastern Han Dynasty (25-220 AD)
bamboo slip used for record keeping during the Han Dynasty
